textBox.richText: Did get a little snow yesterday...WP reports 6.5”. They still only have Phantom Bridge, Little 10, and Freeriders open over at the C-lift, and they’re sketchy. No sunnyside, parsenn, or eagle wind yet either...Retta’s, Outrigger, Over-and-underwood and Engledive are still closed as well...and Pioneer is sketchy. The comp center put on a mini competition today...Max wasn’t so sure to start, but after talking to Dave (and running the course a bunch) yesterday, he decided to sign up. It was a course on Lower Parkway...some tight alpine turns, then a bump field, then going through a couple teepees to the end. Speed didn’t matter; you were judged on form. Max was in the J6’s (8 and under), and he did a great job! Later that day, we met up with Matthias and played around some.
